programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S3
programme.desc: Mat Yoyo - The New Generation is an educational program in its third season and continues to provide children with wholesome family edu-tainment and fun.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Today, on CLUB M.A.G.I.C, Miss P and her agents highlight the importance of respect. Miss P reminds everyone that it is polite and good manners to respect one another and to ask for permission before using each other's things. The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'y' and the words are yam, yawn and yoghurt.

programme.title: Spell Cast S2
programme.desc: Can you spell words like necessary, accommodate or even Kyrgyzstan without the help of Spell Check? Well, our Spell Casters can! This season on Spell Cast, 48 kids aged 9-11 from 30 schools around Singapore are here for the ultimate spelling challenge! They are some of the best spellers around and nothing fazes them. One of them will be crowned the Spell Cast champion at the end of 13 weeks. Who will it be?

programme.title: Tayo Singalong Show S2
programme.desc: Sing along to well-known musical nursery rhymes with Tayo and friends!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Dinoman S2
programme.desc: Dino Man and his friends are always ready to answer the call for help from other dinosaurs in Dino World!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Have you thought about creating a pizza with only your favourite toppings? In this episode, our Try-ers get creative with their choice of ingredients on a pizza.

programme.title: Metal Cardbot S1
programme.desc: A long time ago, there was a planet named Machina where a race of sentient machines, or Metal Cardbots, resided. One day, the planet suddenly explodes, forcing its inhabitants to live on Earth. To not attract attention, the Cardbots disguise themselves as everyday vehicles. In the present day, Jun, an elementary school kid who loves BMX, accidentally discovers the Metal Breath, a wrist gadget that allows him to capture and power up the Cardbots with different abilities.

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: Bakugan 3.1
programme.desc: The Bakugan brawlers are back with new Bakugan buddies! Watch out for an all new origin story.

programme.title: Totally Spies S1
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar
programme.desc: Gento Hiruma becomes the host of Ultraman Blazar, leading the SKaRD (Special Kaiju Reaction Detachment) against the kaiju while figuring out the meaning of visions he has of another galaxy.

programme.title: Toys & Pets
programme.desc: Nathan and his band of toy sidekicks live happily in a teashop. When a robot from the future arrives, Nathan and the Time Bot go on a magical animated adventure to rescue their friend May from evil rat Flash and find an all-knowing mystic to grant Nathan's special wish. They discover that teamwork, friendship, and a little luck are all they need to save the day!

programme.title: Groom My Room S4
programme.desc: Have you ever thought of sleeping in a room with your favourite video game character? Well, the impossible has become possible! Leo has successfully declared war of fight the aliens with the help of Groom My Room! How did we fulfil his dream?

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films & Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Food Tales S1
programme.desc: Food Tales explores the incredible life stories of Singapore's local hawker heroes featured in the annual food and music extravaganza: GastroBeats. With a diverse mix of influences stemming from waves of immigration to a tiny island, Singapore's culinary landscape represents the beating heart of the nation.

programme.title: Paralympic Games Paris 2024: Daily Action
programme.desc: (Live) Featuring Team SG athletes as they compete in the 2024 Summer Paralympics, which is a major international multi-sport event for athletes with disabilities governed by the International Paralympic Committee. The 17th Summer Paralympic Games is held in Paris, France between 28 August and 8 September 2024.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

programme.title: Spy In The Wild S2
programme.desc: Witness nature's greatest dramas and emotional encounters up close as Spy in the Wild returns with its revolutionary spycameras. The series explores mass gatherings among the animal kingdom as its even more lifelike spy creatures infiltrate communities and take you into the heart of the action. Why do animals gather for one-off events? What does it feel like to be part of the herd? And how do they cope with the changing seasons and climate?

programme.desc: A modern take on Charles Dickens's classic tale of a young orphan who is able to triumph over many obstacles.

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: A weekly half hour series revolving around a Singaporean superhero family, The Magnificent Heroes, who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being. Facing daily problems of homework, rudeness, pollution, office politics, busybody neighbours, bullying, peer pressure, relationships, the list is endless. Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Many hawkers and home cooks tend to reuse their cooking oil multiple times. But how safe is this practice? Diana Ser hits hawker centers across the island to find you the answer.

programme.title: Inside Crime Scene S2
programme.desc: All around the world, filicide - the killing of a child by the parent - account for 10-15% of homicide rates. In Singapore, thankfully, our numbers are much lower, though we're also not an exception. What drives parents to kill their precious children? Is altruism an acceptable defense?

programme.title: 你也可以是天使4

programme.title: 幸运星

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: 大荒世界，皓翎王姬玖瑶（小夭）和西炎王子玱玹在朝云峰快乐幸福的成长着。西炎和辰荣爆发战争，玱玹的父亲战死、母亲殉情，祖母在极度悲伤之下也撒手人寰。小夭的母亲临危受命领兵出征。曾经欢歌笑语的朝云峰只剩下小夭和玱玹二人相依为命。小夭的母亲在决战中殉国，西炎王为保小夭平安，执意将小夭送往玉山，玱玹竭力反对但也无力阻止，兄妹二人自此离散。三百年后，西炎和辰荣的纷争已经慢慢平息。平静祥和的清水镇上，一个名为玟小六的医师正在茶寮内听书闲聊，此人正是从玉山偷跑后失踪的皓翎王姬小夭.

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: 玟小六回到医馆回春堂，撞见麻子和春桃约会，嬉笑调侃。老木告知玟小六镇上来了个外来户，租下了街东边的铺子，不知道要做什么生意。玟小六心宽安抚，让他们只管过好自己的日子。玱玹化名为轩，带着阿念和仆从老桑侍女海棠来到清水镇，租下了铺面打算开一间酒铺。玟小六在河边洗碗的时候看到了一个满身是伤的叫花子，出于多一事不如少一事的心态无视离开。麻子和串子可怜叫花子，扔给他半个饼，央求玟小六救他。玟小六再次来到叫花子面前，却发现他没有吃扔在地上的饼却握紧了一朵娇嫩的野花.

programme.desc: (PG13-暴力镜头) 叫花子的天人之姿让众人惊艳，玟小六却知道他肯定身份非凡不想留他。叫花子执意留下，并许诺只听玟小六的话。玟小六给叫花子取名叶十七，让他留在了回春堂。老木帮麻子提亲，却因为聘礼太少被春桃的爹赶出了门。玟小六为凑钱给麻子娶亲，决定进山采药。老木拦下玟小六劝他三思，因为清水镇的后山是辰荣义军的地盘，而辰荣的军师相柳是令人闻风丧胆的九头妖王。玟小六宽慰老木自己只是进山采药并非奸细，不会出事。玱玹的手下递来消息，玱玹想要借机招降相柳，在辰荣军中安插了奸细。.

programme.title: 打开话匣子的街道
programme.desc: 今天的直落亚逸林立着新潮的餐厅和咖啡馆，但两百多年前，景色却截然不同。在直落亚逸湾水域上漂浮着的是一代代的移民，他们渴望新的开始，不用再饿肚子。福建人、同安人、齐智人，还有印度穆斯林，他们离乡背井来到陌生的环境，他们都吃些什么？让艺术创作者Dawn带你一起穿街走巷，探索一道道美食背后的故事。.

programme.desc: (PG13-部分画面令人不安) 叶十七在山中等待玟小六却迟迟不见他回来，追寻踪迹来到了相柳军营。叶十七独闯军营，引起骚动。玟小六和相柳达成交易，保下了叶十七，二人离开。叶十七带着玟小六在山中疗伤，采到了珍贵的灵草，玟小六欣喜，麻子的婚事终于有了着落。麻子给轩公子送婚礼请帖，被海棠嫌弃。麻子和春桃热闹结婚，相柳不请自来，玟小六知道相柳是来威胁自己人质又多了一个。麻子和春桃冲撞了阿念和海棠，被海棠狠狠教训。老木替麻子出气，也被当众戏弄，颜面尽失。.

programme.title: 隐藏的爱

programme.title: 隐藏的爱

programme.desc: 34岁的林静仪，个性活泼又开朗，喜爱旅游的她，3年前和当时的男友到新西兰自驾游时，却发生严重的车祸，导致她脊髓受创，腰部以下全瘫痪，从此须一生与轮椅为伍，车祸后，她与男友也分手了，遭受双重打击的她，痛苦万分。休养7个月后，她决定放下伤痛，重新开始新工作和新生活，她也接受了一段新恋情，但在她内心深处，却还无法释怀发生车祸的情景，一直都在责怪自己，于是她决定再重游新西兰，回到车祸现场，真正"放下"这段悲痛的经历，将它画下一个句点….
